[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(9,19,30,0.9) 0%|rgba(9,19,30,0.9) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(9,19,30,0.9)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(9,19,30,0.9)” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/bill-of-rights-header-bg.jpg” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” custom_css_main_element=”background-position: 50% 67%;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Security

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Strength And Security of
Rosen Group Private Wealth Management

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At Rosen Group Private Wealth Management, we pride ourselves on our commitment to placing clients’ needs first. Our clients have worked hard to build their assets – and we want them to know that we’re going to work even harder at keeping them safe. We have developed a number of safeguards to ensure the protection of client assets held at our firm. There are important reasons why clients trust Rosen Group Private Wealth Management with their investments: we have a strong corporate backing, follow security safekeeping measures, implement investment safeguards, offer industry-wide investor protection, and adhere to strict industry standards.

Rosen Group Private Wealth Management’s principal regulator is the Autorité des marchés financiers (AMF) and we are also registered in Ontario under the Ontario Securities Commission (OSC).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/cta-footer-background-paralax_2.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” global_module=”868″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” module_class=”align-center” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_typing_effect before_typing_effect=”Invest in ” typing_effect=”yourself.|your future.” typing_speed=”50ms” typing_backdelay=”3000ms” typing_cursor=”| ” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” header_text_align_tablet=”center” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”48px” header_font_size_phone=”36px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_typing_effect][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered:
SecurityStrength And Security of Rosen Group Private Wealth ManagementAt Rosen Group Private Wealth Management, we pride ourselves on our commitment to placing clients’ needs first. Our clients have worked hard to build their assets – and we want them to know that we’re going to work even harder at keeping them safe. We have developed a number of safeguards to ensure the protection of client assets held at our firm. There are important reasons why clients trust Rosen Group Private Wealth Management with their investments: we have a strong corporate backing, follow security safekeeping measures, implement investment safeguards, offer industry-wide investor protection, and adhere to strict industry standards. Rosen Group Private Wealth Management’s principal regulator is the Autorité des marchés financiers (AMF) and we are also registered in Ontario under the Ontario Securities Commission (OSC).

Invest in yourself. your future.
